title: Interpretation of a dream about drinking coffee and eating sweets

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about drinking coffee and eating sweets in a dream. Some people may want to know the interpretation of a dream about drinking coffee and eating sweets in a dream, which is one of the dreams that makes the dreamer feel very anxious, but he wants to learn an explanation for that. Therefore, we will learn about its interpretation in the following lines, which are the interpretations of some diligent scholars. The site managers do not interfere in the interpretations, but they quote the interpretations of scholars. Interpretation of a dream about drinking coffee and eating sweets in a dreamDrinking coffee and eating sweets in a dream may indicate the enormous livelihood that the dreamer may gain in the coming days. And God knows best. Seeing coffee and eating sweets in a dream could indicate getting rid of a major problem that the dreamer was in, thanks to God. It is possible that seeing him drinking coffee and eating sweets in a dream indicates positive changes that may happen to the dreamer in his life in the coming days, and God knows best. Seeing yourself drinking coffee and eating sweets in a dream may mean that the tension and anxiety that the dreamer was feeling in his life at the time has stopped, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about distributing sweets to children in a dream: If one sees that he is distributing sweets to children in a dream, this may indicate success. And success in life, thanks to God. A dream about distributing candy to children may be a sign of the happiness that the dreamer gets a lot during this time. Whoever sees in a dream that he is distributing candy to children, may indicate positive changes that will happen to the dreamer in his life during those days, thanks to God. If there is a vision of distributing sweets to children, this may be an indication of the financial and family stability that the dreamer enjoys during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about stealing sweets and eating them in a dream: If a person sees that he stole sweets and then ate them, this may indicate the goodness that he will obtain. The dreamer will see the dreamer in the coming period, thanks to God. In the case of a vision of stealing and eating sweets, this may indicate changes occurring in the dreamer’s life during this period, and he needs to seek help from God. It is possible that the vision of stealing sweets and eating them in a dream indicates ample livelihood that the owner will obtain. The vision in his life is thanks to God. Whoever sees in a dream that he stole sweets and ate them may indicate great material gains that the dreamer may acquire during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about selling sweets in a dreamIn the event that a person sees that he is selling sweets in a dream, this may indicate To a high position that the dreamer will take in his life during those days. If a person sees that he is selling sweets in a dream, this may indicate good changes that will occur to the visionary in his life during this period, and God knows best. Whoever dreams that he is selling sweets may indicate the presence of enemies surrounding him. And he will get rid of them easily in the coming days. Seeing selling sweets in a dream could indicate happy events that will happen to the dreamer in his life during this period, and God knows best. title: Interpretation of being tall in a dream: You became tall in a dream

preview.html: Dreaming of a tall person means an increase in money, longevity, and other interpretations. We will interpret it for a single girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, for a man, such as the height of the dead person or a vision. A tall man, a tall woman, or a tall child, according to Ibn Sirin and others, in continuation of the topic: The interpretation has become great in a dream. What he sees has accumulated in a dream. The vision generally indicates an increase in knowledge, learning, money, and longevity. If the dreamer is one of those who have trade and money, then his vision shows the profit and money he gets from His tradeAnd if the fortuneteller is a president or an office holder, then his vision shows control and good management of his business and his good intercessor is spreading among the people. If the official sees that he has arisen in a dream, the vision indicates the long time he will spend in his presidency and authority and that he will defeat his opponents and enemies and be able to defeat them The person who sees in his dream that he has become tall, and this person is one of those who seek to reach power and kingship, so his vision shows that he will get what he wants and take a position. And whoever sees in his dream that he has become tall in the dream while in reality he is short in stature compared to his peers, then His vision indicates the temptations and doubts that the dreamer falls into. Whoever sees that he is tall in a dream increases his knowledge and money, and if the dreamer is a strong ruler, then his authority is good and his behavior is good, and if he is a merchant, his trade will be profitable. Whoever sees that his share has extended to what It is beyond limit, its duration is within reach. If the king sees that his stature is tall, then his kingdom will last, and his enemies will be defeated, and if he is a seeker for the king, then he will obtain it. And height indicates the length of life. Whoever sees that he is tall in a dream, then his knowledge and money will increase, and if the dreamer is a lord, then his authority is strong, and he has good behavior in him, and if he is a merchant, then his trade will be profitable. If a person sees that his time has gone far, then his period is approaching and he will fall from his rank and from the kingship. If he sees that his stature is tall, then his kingdom will last and triumph over his enemies, and if he is seeking the kingdom he will reach it, and high stature indicates longevity, and if it extends beyond that. Limit, indicates death. Likewise, short stature indicates death due to its proximity to the ground, and short stature indicates anxiety, and can indicate stinginess and pretending to be tall and strong, and there is no good in tall stature. If short, this indicates a decline in destiny or range. shortatOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? 's' : '') + '://tinyplywood. com/472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d/invoke.js"></scr' + 'ipt>');Seeing a high position in a dream indicates people who want to do the rest of the work and are interested in art. Tall stature shows the influence that the person with the vision will have on the hearts of others, and his high status in the world will also indicate that he will have a high position in the world

title: Interpretation of a dream about tearing clothes in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing tearing clothes in a dream means doubt and loss of control, and other interpretations that we will explain to the single, married, pregnant, or divorced person, such as tearing clothes by hand, or dreaming of tearing clothes with scissors, or cutting new or old clothes according to Ibn Sirin, and others in the continuation of the topic: Interpretation of tearing clothes In a dream, dreaming of tearing clothes is evidence that the dreamer enjoys honor, status, and respect from those around him. To dream of tearing clothes means that you are making progress and controlling the situation properly, but sometimes you may feel that you are not ready for some situations. This dream indicates that you will face some problems and dangers that You will be able to overcome it soon. Tearing clothes in a dream means that your life contains some sweetness and pleasure. Anyone who sees himself tearing clothes using scissors in a dream means that this person is ready for a new start and has a positive outlook on life and where it is headed.atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? To dream that you are tearing clothes is a symbol of fear of incompetence or weakness Emotional, as this vision indicates that you are in a situation where you fear ridicule or ridicule. Your dream is a sign that some aspects of your life are beyond your control and evidence that there are some people trying to control you and the vision means that you are searching for a feeling of security and protection.atOptions = { 'key ' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? And that you are worried about what people think of you and that your dream indicates the end of a habit, behavior or idea. Tearing clothes in a dream indicates that you have been deceived and that you are looking for a new way to express yourself and expand your thinking, and you may have some unfulfilled desires or unfinished business. title: Interpretation of a dream about a satellite in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing a satellite in a dream shows a useless person and other interpretations. We will explain this to the single, married, pregnant, divorced, man, such as a dream about a shower or a dish that receives a satellite signal from channels or someone who sees the remote control of a receiver or seeing a satellite dish according to Ibn Sirin. And more in continuation of the topic: Interpretation of a satellite in a dream Seeing a receiver or a satellite in a dream may indicate the leadership of those who are up to no good, and it may refer to the leadership of the group by those who are up to no good. A dream about a satellite dish may mean that you will find a free source For resources or some way to save money and this method will be new and no one has done it before.atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? If you dream of seeing A working receiver, it means that you will get someone's help and they will convince you to make some important decisions in your life, but you will live in fragile conditions and an uncomfortable situation for a long time. To dream of a satellite dish means that you are aware of the events that They occur all over the world. Dreaming about a satellite dish means that you will soon connect with an old friend that you have not heard from in a while. Watching television in a dream means a warning or a sign that you need to pay attention to some things that will change or be corrected. Television also symbolizes To see, monitor, or correct something important. If you dream of a television and some sports programs, you will see the best sports team in your city. title: Interpretation of a dream about clay on the hair of the head in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing mud in your hair in a dream means that you are facing some problems and other interpretations that we will explain to single, married, pregnant, divorced women or men, such as seeing mud on the head or hair stained with mud or mud according to Ibn Sirin and others in: Interpretation of mud in hair in a dream Seeing mud in the hair or someone who sees mud on his head in a dream is considered one of the unfavorable visions, because mud in the hair indicates the presence of many problems, difficulties and fears that the dreamer will face, but this vision shows that these problems will end quickly. Dreaming of mud in your hair indicates psychological comfort and indicates that you are balanced in your personal, social and professional life, and the presence of mud in your hair in a dream indicates that you are a calm person, but you will be aggressive if you feel threatened. .atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? 's' : '') + '://tinyplywood.com/472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d/invoke.js"></scr' + 'ipt>');This dream sometimes indicates the growth and development of business and shows a new birth, either the birth of a child or the birth of a new project or idea. If you see that mud fills your hair in a dream, this means that you may need to be more emotionally adventurous and you should not let your feelings be suppressed, but you should express what you have inside and tell your lover the truth of your feelings. Mud in the hair also indicates that you feel nostalgic for your childhood memories and the vision indicates that you are working to beautify your image and polish your reputation in front of others. atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? 's' : '') + '://tinyplywood.com/472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d/invoke.js"></scr' + 'ipt>');Whoever sees that his hair is stained with mud in a dream, it means that he is an unknown and hesitant person, so he needs clarity in some matters, and this dream is evidence of your achievements and your rise to the top of the social ladder. But at the same time, it indicates the fear of failure. Dreaming of mud in your hair is evidence of your fears of discovering or publishing some hidden aspects of your life. The dream also shows that you need everything in its place and that you need to avoid problems and troubles during this time. Having hair in the mud means that you will avoid some feelings or reject the lover's requests. This dream also indicates the end of something and the beginning of something else, such as the end of a relationship or entering into a new relationship or the beginning of a new business plan. atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : {} }; documen

title: Interpretation of a dream about laughing in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about laughter in a dream for a single woman: Laughter is one of the forms of human expression that occurs as a reaction to funny or happy situations, but it may also be a means of defense when you feel ridiculed by others or to hide sadness, embarrassment, or fear. There are many interpretations of seeing laughter in a dream, Especially in a single woman’s dream, so in this article we will discuss the interpretation of different and common visions of laughter in a single woman’s dream.Interpretation of a dream of laughter in a dream by Ibn SirinInterpretation of a dream of laughter in a dream for a single womanInterpreters differed in interpreting the vision of laughter in a dream for a single woman. title: What is Ibn Sirin's interpretation of seeing someone urinating on you in a dream?

preview.html: Seeing someone urinating on you in a dream is one of the dreams that carry many meanings, including good and evil. It usually indicates anxiety and fear that reside in the dreamer’s heart, and the vision itself is strange and disturbing, because urine comes from impurities. Today, the interpretation of this dream will be discussed in detail on an Egyptian website. Seeing someone urinating on you In Ibn Sirin’s dream, seeing someone urinating on you in a dream, urinating in a dream is a common vision, but at the same time it is strange and indicates that the dreamer cannot control any of the matters in his life and is in a hurry to make decisions, so he is always in trouble. In a dream, you have to carry a good side, which is success in life and achieving many goals, as well as overcoming sorrows. Whoever dreams that someone urinates on him, and on the other hand does not feel angry, indicates that in the near future he will obtain a lot of money in addition to the abundant luck that It will accompany him in his life. Dreaming about someone urinating on him indicates that the dreamer has a large number of good qualities and is largely tolerant of all those who have wronged him. The vision is usually not very promising and shows that the dreamer is a weak person who cannot stand up to him. everyone who harms him in this world.atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? 's' : '') + '://tinyplywood. com/472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d/invoke.js"></scr' + 'ipt>');Seeing someone urinating on you in a dream by Ibn SirinThe respected researcher Ibn Sirin explained that seeing someone urinating on you in a dream indicates that in the coming period the dreamer will be dominated by feelings of anxiety The fear is unusually unjustified, and this is what makes him not think positively. His present. Whoever dreams that someone sits on him to urinate shows that he cannot deal with the worries and sorrows that dominate his life and always feels that he is restricted and can never live his life. Life as he wants, his marriage to a woman of extraordinary beauty and high morals. Seeing someone urinating on you in a single woman’s dream: Seeing someone urinating on an unmarried woman is evidence that she cannot control any of the matters in her life, and she always makes decisions that make her face many problems. As Ibn Shaheen said, explaining this dream, she will succeed in everything. aspects of her life in addition to getting rid of worry, anxiety and sadness.atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? title: What is the interpretation of seeing curly hair in a dream?

preview.html: Curly hair in a dream Seeing hair in a dream has many meanings and meanings that differ depending on the image that the dreamer sees, as the nature of the hair, whether it is smooth or curly, greatly affects the interpretations accompanying the dream, and for this reason we will explain through our website all the interpretations of seeing curly hair, and what the vision carries. Good or bad signs of opinion, as reported by leading commentators. Curly hair in a dream Curly hair in a dream Many interpretation experts said that seeing hair on the head in general is a promising sign because it leads to an increase in goodness and abundance of livelihood in the dreamer’s life, and it is also an indicator of enjoying health. Longevity and longer hair are long and beautiful, indicating that one’s life is full of protection and blessings. But what about curly hair, do they have the same interpretation as before? The interpretation of seeing curly hair depends on its appearance and the viewer’s feelings when seeing it, meaning that healthy, shiny curly hair and the dreamer’s sense of self-satisfaction and happiness when seeing it are all promising signs because they indicate a change in his person. Life is for the better, achieving the goals that he hopes to achieve, and thus enjoying great happiness, happiness and peace of mind.atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params': {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? 's' : '') + '://tinyplywood. com/472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d/invoke.js"></scr' + 'ipt>');As for seeing the transformation of long, straight hair into another curly hair that is very close to the point of attachment to the scalp, it indicates unwanted signs that indicate the extent of the losses. Which the dreamer will be exposed to, whether it is a losing material. His current job or the house in which he lives, or moral losses due to the emergence of disagreements and disagreements with the people of his immediate environment, and God knows best. Curly hair in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin went to his interpretations to see curly hair with various symbols and associations that reflect the personality of the dreamer, as curly hair indicates strength. The dreamer's courage, as he possesses the courage and determination to overcome difficult issues and difficult circumstances. Which he goes through in his life, as he has good morals and a distinct temperament, which makes him a beloved person who many prefer to get close to. If the dreamer has a private job and sees in his dream that his curly hair is short and falling out a lot, then this is considered a bad omen for losing a large portion of his money in the coming period, So he must be careful. . So as not to be mistaken, seeing curly white hair indicates the harsh living conditions and the dreamer’s suffering from poverty and need, God forbid.atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' ' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? 's' : '') + ':

title: Interpretation of a dream about a bus falling into the sea

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream of a bus falling into the sea in a dreamInterpretation of a dream of a bus falling into the sea in a dreamInterpretation of a dream of a bus falling into the sea in a dream It can lead to bad things, and God knows the unseen. If a young man sees a bus falling into the sea in a dream, this may indicate committing sins, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Seeing a car falling into the sea also expresses the loss of a loved one, and God knows the unseen. When a single girl sees a car falling into the sea, it could be a sign of a problem, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about my mother being hit by a car in a dream. Interpretation of dreams that my mother collided with a car in a dream. Seeing an accident could happen. It indicates crises, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees a car accident in a dream, it may be an indication of financial crises, and God knows the unseen. If a married man sees a car accident, it may indicate harm, and God knows best. It can also express problems of prestige or power, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about my friend who hit her A car in a dream: Interpretation of a dream about my friend who was hit by a car in a dream. We did not find any specific explanations for seeing this. However, seeing a car accident in a dream could be a sign of a problem, and God knows the unseen. In the event that a single girl sees someone in a traffic accident, this may lead to difficulties in achieving her goals, and God knows best. When the dreamer sees a car accident for his friend Without seeing it, it may lead to trouble, and God knows best. Interpretation of my daughter’s dream of a car accident in a dream. Interpretation of my daughter’s dream of a car accident in a dream. A car accident for a close person could be a sign of his need for help, and God knows best. Whereas if the dreamer sees someone close to him in an accident and injured, this may indicate Indicates that he is in trouble and that God knows the unseen. Likewise, if a married man sees someone close to him in a car accident, this may lead to a financial crisis, and God Almighty knows. As it may express a person’s need for help, and God is higher and more knowledgeable. Interpretation of a dream about a car running over my son in Dream Interpretation of dreams about a car falling on top of my son in a dream. Trampling a child could be a sign of trouble, and God knows best. When you see a child being beaten, this may indicate crises, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees a child being beaten, this may lead to a financial crisis, and God knows best. Likewise, if a married woman sees a child being trampled under his foot, this may be A sign of negligence in the affairs of her home, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream for a relative about a car accident and his survival in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a relative getting into a car accident and surviving from it in a dream may represent crises, but they will end, God willing. As the vision of surviving a car accident can express Goodness and salvation from obstacles and difficulties, and God knows the unseen. When a married man sees a car accident involving his relative and his survival, it can lead to salvation from crises, and God knows best. If an unmarried girl sees a car accident involving one of her relatives and his survival in a dream, this may indicate her marriage. From the beloved, but she faces some difficulties, and God knows best

title: Interpretation of seeing hazelnuts in a dream: seeing eating hazelnuts in a dream

preview.html: A dream about hazelnuts shows human generosity and other interpretations. We will interpret it for a single woman, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, or a married or single woman, such as buying hazelnuts. Whoever eats hazelnuts and picking from a hazelnut tree or dreams of eating cherries, according to Ibn Sirin, Imam al-Sadiq, al-Nabulsi and others, in continuation of the topic: Interpretation of hazelnuts in a dream by Ibn Sirin. His Highness Sheikh Muhammad bin Sirin mentioned that seeing hazelnuts in a dream symbolizes a person’s generosity and generosity. Hazelnuts in a man’s dream are evidence. The closeness of this person’s religiosity in performing his duties, his obedience to God Almighty, and his love for others around him. The dream of eating hazelnuts is an indication of the money that the dreamer receives after toil and exhaustion. However, the vision of eating dry or dried hazelnuts indicates anxiety, sadness, or distress that befalls the dreamer. ( Hazelnuts) in a dream are a strange, generous, heavy spirit that is common among people, and it is said that it is money from hard work, so whoever eats it will get money from hard work, and the Virgin, if she enters the dream and what she does not know.atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', ' format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? 's' : '') + '://tinyplywood. com/472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d/invoke.js"></scr' + 'ipt>');To dream of hazelnuts is a favorable dream, indicating a calm and harmonious family life and profitable business deals. If you dream that you are eating hazelnuts, this means pleasant associations and many friends. Sincere people, if you are a young man. To eat the heart of a hazelnut, which is sweet and good, then announce the acquisition of legitimate money while eating, and if it is bitter, then it is forbidden money. Ibn Sirin said: The heart of the hazelnut is money and benefit. And whoever sees: a corrupt or bitter heart, this indicates that he will hear insults from The miser. And whoever sees that he is eating the core of a hazelnut, which is sweet and good, then this indicates the acquisition of legitimate money while eating, and if it is bitter, then it is forbidden money. And whoever sees that he is eating a hazelnut, then he will obtain money from a wealthy person. atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? 's' : '') + '://tinyplywood. com/472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d/invoke.js"></scr' + 'ipt>');Ibn Sirin said in his interpretation of seeing hazelnuts in a dream, and he said that whoever dreams of seeing hazelnuts in a dream shows that this person has a reputation for generosity and that he spends a lot in jealousy. He does not expect to get what he is. He gave it to others in reality. He also said that whoever dreams of seeing hazelnuts in a dream is an indication that this person will obtain a lot of money, which will be from a permissible source after fatigue and effort in his work. Ibn Sirin also said that seeing hazelnuts in a dream can mean that a person Whoever dreams will suffer heartache and problems in reality.atOptions = { 'key'

's' : '') + '://tinyplywood. com/472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d/invoke.js"></scr' + 'ipt>');To dream of hazelnuts is a favorable dream, indicating a calm and harmonious family life and profitable business deals. If you dream that you are eating hazelnuts, this means pleasant associations and many friends. Sincere people, if you are a young man. To eat the heart of a hazelnut, which is sweet and good, then announce the acquisition of legitimate money while eating, and if it is bitter, then it is forbidden money. Ibn Sirin said: The heart of the hazelnut is money and benefit. And whoever sees: a corrupt or bitter heart, this indicates that he will hear insults from The miser. And whoever sees that he is eating the core of a hazelnut, which is sweet and good, then this indicates the acquisition of legitimate money while eating, and if it is bitter, then it is forbidden money. And whoever sees that he is eating a hazelnut, then he will obtain money from a wealthy person. atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? 's' : '') + '://tinyplywood. com/472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d/invoke.js"></scr' + 'ipt>');Ibn Sirin said in his interpretation of seeing hazelnuts in a dream, and he said that whoever dreams of seeing hazelnuts in a dream shows that this person has a reputation for generosity and that he spends a lot in jealousy. He does not expect to get what he is. He gave it to others in reality. He also said that whoever dreams of seeing hazelnuts in a dream is an indication that this person will obtain a lot of money, which will be from a permissible source after fatigue and effort in his work.
